tool_description: Generates chord progressions based on musical key, scale type, and progression style preferences.

scale_type.description: Scale type: major, minor, dorian, mixolydian, pentatonic

style.description: Musical style: pop, jazz, blues, classical, rock

error_messages: Invalid key format: Use standard notation (C, C#, Db, etc.)
Unsupported scale type: Choose from major, minor, dorian, mixolydian, pentatonic
Invalid progression length: Must be between 2-16 chords
Unknown style: Select from pop, jazz, blues, classical, rock
usage: Specify the musical key and scale type, optionally set progression length and style. Returns a sequence of chords with Roman numeral analysis.

chords.description: Array of chord symbols (e.g., Cmaj7, Am, F)
